item.description:
This will be a great opportunity to network with other cyclists from the area, while also learning more about how you can get involved in the fight against cancer!

 

Belmont Wheelworks is hosting this event, and providing beer for attendees. Dinner is being provided by Redbones BBQ.

 

Bicycles Battling Cancer event is set to take place on Sunday, June 10, 2012, with a start/finish line at the Bolton Fairgrounds in Lancaster, MA, and the goal for this year is to engage 500 riders and raise over $500,000 for the fight against cancer. Each rider makes a fundraising commitment of $300, and receives an event jersey for raising $500 or more.

 

The funds raised through Bicycles Battling Cancer support the American Cancer Society's life saving mission of creating a world with less cancer and more birthdays! To learn more about the ride, visit the event Web site at www.bicyclesbattlingcancer.org.
item.name: Join us to learn more about Bicycles Battling Cancer
